tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We don't get impressed by someone so easily but Dr Shruti's invaluable support and exceptional care throughout our journey towards parenthood made us write this review. Thanks to her expertise and kindness, we have been blessed with a healthy baby who is about three months old now.
Dr Shruti is very knowledgeable and kind hearted. Her genuine concern and care for her patients is quite evident. She was very patient with us throughout the treatment period which is difficult with people like us who have a lot of questions. 
We recommend anyone facing any fertility related challenges to reach out to her. ***** *** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: **** ****** *** ********* **********she is patient and answers all queries very well…due to her treatment I conceived..always greatful to her ☺️

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We are thankful beyond words for Dr. Shruti Parikh. She is truly a remarkable Doctor and we feel she truly came as a  blessing from God for us. She is a perfect Doctor you can find. She is Compassionate, Knowledgeable, Understanding and Kind. Through out the course of treatment she kept us informed about the whole process and always offered us the right treatment. She is professional in her approach and really a very honest human being. Most of times, Couples like us do not understand such treatments and are very nervous about the way ahead. But Dr. Shruti explained to us in very detail about the whole treatment, explaining all the terminologies. She is Calm Composed and has a natural knack in lowering your worries. I called her many times during our treatment and she was available each and every time and explained to us all our queries. Even she went out of the way in arranging the right medicines for us. She has a positive vibe which install confidence in you every time you talk to her. She gives lot of attention to details. She could have easily asked us to go for IVF directly and we would have even agreed. But she went through proper process. 

Thank you Madam for all your help. We would always be grateful to you because it is only because of you, we are on our way to have our first Baby. No words will be enough to explain the joy you bought us in our life. 

We recommend Dr. Shruti to every Couple who have difficulty in conceiving. *** ** *** **** ****** ** ****** * We are very grateful to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have been TTC for 5 years and meeting Dr. Shruti was the wisest decision in our journey. After ineffective line of treatments and disappointments in the past, Dr. Shruti gave us a new ray of hope. She counselled us thoroughly in our first meeting and explained all options which made us feel secured and hopeful in this otherwise stressful journey of TTC with infertility. Dr. Shruti is passionate and ensures she gives you the right amount of information and logical reasoning for every step taken in the treatment process. There were no unnecessary medicines or tests suggested, she was methodical and reassuring throughout and also ensure I am comfortable with the process. She was also available on WhatsApp to resolve doubts/queries without hesitation despite her busy schedule. I feel blessed to have been treated by her and most important of all thanks to her patience and positive approach to any roadblocks along the way and that today under her guidance we are finally pregnant with our first child. I would highly recommend Dr. Shruti to all the couple struggling to conceive or even those who want expert advice on family planning and future options. Heartfelt thanks Dr. Shruti, wishing you abundant success in your profession.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review:
Dr Shruti Parikh is simply great...her decision making power,solutions to problems ,easy way to tackle them,n most of it was her patience in dealing with me as i am oversensitive all the time...at one point of time i trusted her more than myself ..i use to feel she is there wid me na ho jayega...her freindliness was fabulous ...no doctor can be so patient to answer ur silliest questions nor do they have any time for it ...but with dr shruti parikh she was always instant ..n trust me she have answered all my questions in the middle of the night also spontaneously...her dedication n personal care made all the things achievable for me...I highly recommend her for every couple who are dealing with fertility issues knowingly or unknowingly ...She changed my life and made everything possible with her expertise...I and my husband highly recommend her ...
God is not everywhere but she came as a saviour to us n here we are as 2 months pregnant ....she came as an angel in our life  did her job ,made me concieve and changed my life...
Thank u so much mam ....i and my family will always be grateful to u....love u mam ....may sucess touch ur feet always....god bless

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
This is the review I am writing after our one-year journey with Dr. Shruti ma'am.

We were planning our second child, and during that time, my wife had two spontaneous miscarriages with pregnancies of less than two months. After the last miscarriage, it was almost 1.5 years; she could not even conceive. We were getting impatient. In between, we changed our gynecologist and moved to a second one who suggested she has PCOS. After a few months of PCOS treatment and seeing no improvement, we thought of taking a second opinion.

I had seen the board of Shruti ma'am clinic on link road earlier but was hesitant then. As it was COVID time,  we consulted online Shruti ma'am on our first call. During that call, she ruled out PCOS. She logically explained that the AMH level of my wife is small, so it can't be PCOS. It was a big realization for us that we were on the wrong track, and we immediately switched to ma'am.

During this one-year journey, we have seen her closely putting tremendous efforts for us to see the result. She will constantly carry out some improvements in medicines and herself will do the follicular scan. Instead of just believing in ultrasound reports, she will present there to see if everything is fine. She will follow the path methodically and logically.

She is a confident and amazing doctor. She is available round the clock for you to handle any emergency or query. She will make the patient feel at ease and will provide moral support. Her presence gives very positive vibes and makes you believe you will see your baby one day. In the beginning, I was skeptical seeing all the 5 star reviews, but I now realize the reason for them.

Due to her efforts, my wife has now conceived and is now in 3rd month. We have got some wisdom during this time. For those struggling to conceive for more than a year, better see a fertility specialist as a regular gynecologist won't be of much help. If you are with Shruti ma'am, just follow her guidance regarding medicines, injections, tests, etc., and trust her instincts. Believe me; you will reach your goal timely with that.

Just as ma'am is wonderful, her staff at the clinic also deserves the same praise. They are cooperative and ready to help you out with small small things.

Lastly, ma'am, thank you is a very small word to say for what you have given us. Throughout our life, we will be grateful to you for the joy you have brought in our life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Shruti is a blessing in disguise. We are forever grateful to her. Was trying to conceive for several years with no result and solution. Knocked the doors of top notch doctors yet failed in figuring out the issue. Consulted Dr Shruti as our last hope. She was calm and gave all her ears to our queries throughout the visits. She explained every reports in layman’s terms which gave us comfort in trusting her knowledge. During the treatment she found out the root cause of the issue and due to her exceptional medical knowledge we are blessed with a baby girl. Our lives are filled with joy. We highly recommend and encourage all those couples who are undergoing infertility to consult Dr Shruti for the best result.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review:
I had approached Dr Shruti to get help in my fertility journey. I had PCOD for the longest time was having trouble conceiving on my own. 
Since day 1, she patiently guided me and my husband with the process and set clear expectations about the journey ahead. She gave ample time and attention to me throughout and was always available for any concerns or questions that I had in the process. Can’t thank her enough for all her support and guidance. 100% recommend for anyone who is looking for guidance in their fertility journey.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My husband and I are beyond thankful for Dr Shruti. She is a wonderful, caring and kind doctor. Dr Shruti is a blessing from God and no words are enough to express our appreciation. Dr Shruti has played such an important role in our lives; she went above and beyond everything we ever would have expected and will forever remain grateful. Her kindness and compassion have been such a blessing! Dr Shruti always kept us informed during the entire treatment process and often took the time to personally call us to check on us. She is very knowledgeable, understanding and comforting.
If you’re looking for the absolute best care for IVF, I highly recommend Dr.Shruti. She is excellent in every way.Thank you all for your support throughout our journey! Thank you, Dr Shruti for this life changing experience. You made our dream a reality.

review:
We have been trying for few years with no sucess .
I am writing this review with the hope of helping others that are going thru this struggle .
I feel blessed to find dr shruti parikh bcoz she made me very comfortable in all ways . She took her time to explain my conditions with me as well as my treatment options .
Best thing about dr shruti is she cares about her patient .
In our case things was too complicated . I had full septum so need to undergo couple of hysteroscopy to remove septum .
We followed her advice , listened her opinion and left everything on her hand. We truested her very much bcoz she made us belive . 
almost one year with various of treatments  we are now expecting our baby .
There are not enough words to express our gratitude to dr shruti parikh 
She is truly a god send

Regards
Vidhi Dave

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had visited Dr. Shruti for fertility consultation. She is a very friendly doctor, she helps you understand your issues in a very simplified manner and her guidance to going about is amazing. 

She gives a lot of attention to details and takes time out to explain and address every issue. Doesn’t prescribe unnecessary tests and medicines. 

Unlike most doctors she doesn't rush you and she is also always available to answer your concerns on Whatsapp and phone.

Whenever you meet her you only get positive vibes and an assurance that everything will fall in place soon. The interaction with the Dr. is always peaceful and you leave the clinic leaving your stress and anxieties behind. 

*** ** *** **** *** * **** **** *** *** am completely satisfied with her treatment. Would definitely recommend family and friends to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Shruti is very kind and polite doctor. I have been seeing the doctor from last one year. She will listen to all of  your problems patiently and answers each and every question.
Very approachable and helpful, always provide best solution without unnecessary troubles (tests). You can completely rely on the doctor, once you are in you can leave all worries to her and you can keep your complete trust on her.
She takes care of you very well and  can be reached out for any issues anytime.
We are very satisfied with our treatment & thankful to her for that,,, 
Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We had visited Dr Shruti for planning our first child. I had visited her earlier for some other consultations and from that time I had confidence in her that should would be the best for any advise and treatments needed. She is so positive, knowledgeable, understanding and friendly.  During our first consultation she asked about our complete life style to better understand us and did thorough examination. During this examination, I was diagnosed with multiple fibroids and she suggested me to go through Myomectomy to ensure it does not create any issues while conceiving. 
Entire procedure was taken by her and I did not face any challenges. Through out the course of treatment she kept us informed about the whole process and always offered us the right treatment. 
I messaged her many times during our treatment and she was available each and every time and responded to all our queries.  She gave us ample time and resolved all our questions and queries without rushing during face to face consultation as well. I am grateful that I made decision to choose Dr Shruti who brought happiness in our Life.
I will recommend all couples to visit Dr Shruti for consultations.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been consulting Dr. Shruti since 2017 for multiple reasons. She has always suggested me the best recommendations and medications during all our encounters. I would recommend her a thousand times to anyone looking for a friendly, receptive, and experienced gynaecologist.

She was fully invested in it and all her efforts came to fruition. We can't thank her enough for everything.

Visited Dr. Shruti for consultation regarding some fertility related issues, She guided me with the issues and the treatment for the same . She won't recommend you any unnecessary medicines or test, will not suggest you with any unnecessary procedures if not required and will answer all you doubts with patience and put you at ease. She has a practical and modern approach towards her practice,  She has always been there with me for all the ultrasounds , guiding and precisely answering to all the queries. 

Thanks and would always be grateful to her , we are on our way to have our first baby and in the very first attempt after consulting her.

She will always guide you in a right fashion and will be available for any support for their patients. I would strongly recommend Doctor Shruti for any one who is looking for pregnancy or fertility related treatment. She will never push you for only medical treatment but also provide the natural ways to help you for pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: After going to many doctors, we came to Dr Shruti. She is an amazing person who makes you feel so comfortable while explaining the entire process and even during the procedures. Due to some bad experiences with previous doctors, I was really scared but she assured me that she would never do anything to hurt me and continuously gave me assurance and comfort during my procedures. During our entire time with her there were no unnecessary medicines or tests suggested, she knew exactly what she was doing  and was methodical and reassuring throughout and also ensured that I was comfortable with the process. She was also available on WhatsApp to resolve doubts/queries without hesitation despite her busy schedule. Today under her guidance we are pregnant with our first child.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Gynae Problems,Hysteroscopy,Pregnancy Tests,Ultrasonography - Pelvic,
review: I would have been probably one of the most challenging patients Dr. Shruti Parikh would have had so far. With more than 2 years association with her, I can hands down recommend her to anyone who needs help of every sort in terms of getting pregnant, guiding couple, solving the most complicated problem with so much patience and ease. Now is the stage where I know if she is around, I am okay and in safe hands. I know when it is her, things will be more than okay and she can possibly do anything and everything possible in her hands to make it happen for you. I am saying this because I have witnessed it myself with me in life as I write this. It’s like truly having an older sister around with so much warmth and friendliness, it is easy to share, open up with your matters, discuss in a healthy way  with complete logic and rational and make it happen.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),Premature Ovarian Failure,
review: I am consulting Dr shruti since last 1 and half years now . Dr Shruti was our saviour , she diagnosed my endometriosis and premature ovarian failure at a very early stage and helped me to deal with it throughout the treatment and our fertility journey not just medically but also considered our financial and emotional aspects that comes with it and tried to help us in whatever way possible ,despite of her busy schedule Dr shruti always  replied to the msgs  . We are eternally thankful to her. It's just coz of her efforts , we are soon to be parents which many doctors said to me was impossible for me to achieve with my medical situation. Dr shruti will always be very dear to us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: After facing an incomplete abortion during first pregnancy, we were trying to have baby for more than a year. Dr. Shruti explained to us what our entire treatment plan would be and suggested few tests and lifestyle changes. The doctor will not try to put you on unnecessary medication or treatments until all the natural ways to conceive do not seem to materialize. She will listen to all your queries & concerns and answer all of them. I was really nervous due to my last pregnancy, but the doctor was very patient and makes you feel comfortable to share your doubts. After 3 months, I was able to conceive naturally! All thanks to Dr. Shruti!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: * **** ******* ** ** ****** ****** **** ** * **** **** *** beautiful women with beautiful soul god bless her always I m amazed how she explained each and every step of the procedure she take good care of her patients and understand their problems she understands from what we r going through she treats us in such a manner that v feel very safe and secure with her every time I met her I get positive vibes from her she gives her full attention and makes us feel comfortable she treats us like her family member and does a proper treatment step by step  she is just fantastic  can right so many things about her ☺️ she is always available on Wats app and phone so no worries *** ** *** **** ** I vl highly recommend her

Words cannot describe Dr Shruti Parikh’s positive attitude and expertise she has in treating patients .From day one of our visit with Dr Shruti we found her to be a very reassuring and focused on the issue at hand. Dr Shruti believes in outcomes by taking step by step actions and does not suggest any unnecessary opinions or create a panicky situation. During my wife pregnancy she was a pillar of guidance and support that helped my wife lot. They say Doctor’s are next to GOD and experienced that with Dr Shruti .
